mapper.insert: insert into check_info(user_code, check_area_x, check_ip, check_area_y, company_code,check_success,check_date) values (#{userCode},#{checkAreaX},#{checkIp},#{checkAreaY},#{companyCode},#{checkSuccess},#{checkDate});
mapper.select:
select user_code as userCode, check_success as checkSuccess, check_area_x as checkAreaX, check_ip as checkIp, delete_flag as deleteFlag,check_area_y as checkAreaY, company_code as companyCode, check_date as checkDate from check_info ci where delete_flag = 0
and user_code = #{userCode}

select user_code as userCode, check_success as checkSuccess, check_area_x as checkAreaX, check_ip as checkIp, delete_flag as deleteFlag,check_area_y as checkAreaY, company_code as companyCode, check_date as checkDate from check_info ci where delete_flag = 0
and company_code = #{companyCode}
